sentence.Network_en: Work tips : Without some positive energy , Scorpio can go to extremes.
sentence.Network_cn: 工作: 如果缺乏积极因素, 蝎子可能走向极端.

sentence.Network_en: The sun , actually in Scorpio, was shining across into Taurus.
sentence.Network_cn: 其实在天蝎宫的太阳, 照耀着金牛宫.

sentence.Network_en: Scorpio's health Habits: Scorpio people are renowned for their energy and imagination.
sentence.Network_cn: 健康习性: 概括来说,天蝎座的人有强壮的身体并且恢复能力强.

entry.tran: 天蝎宫，天蝎座(黄道十二宫之一。出生于10月23日至11月21日之间的人属此星座)
entry.def: Scorpio is one of the twelve signs of the zodiac. Its symbol is a scorpion. People who are born approximately between the 23rd of October and the 21st of November come under this sign.

entry.tran: 出生于天蝎宫时段的人
entry.def: A Scorpio is a person whose sign of the zodiac is Scorpio.

means.word_mean: 1. (astrology) a person who is born while the sun is in Scorpio
2. a large zodiacal constellation between Libra and Sagittarius
3. the eighth sign of the zodiac; the sun is in this sign from about October 23 to November 21
